spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout matches the 2D plan (left twin-bed room, central bath + small study/utility, right bedroom, bottom living, right kitchen/dining). However, several openings are represented as plain wall gaps rather than correctly placed/swinging doors, and window placement/segmentation does not cleanly match the 2D (notably the top wall glazing appears merged/extended and the left-side glazing differs from the plan). Minor proportion shifts in some partitions (living room enclosure/central corridor width) compared to the 2D.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are mostly correct and all primary rooms are present. Wall thickness is uniform and reasonable, but door embedding is not faithful (missing door leaves/swing arcs; several openings appear as open passages). At least one glazing run is hallucinatorily continuous/extended compared to the discrete windows suggested in the plan. One minor furniture element appears added (coffee table) that is not on the 2D.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture groups map well (two single beds + wardrobe in left room; bath fixtures; desk in small room; bed + desk in right bedroom; sofa/chair/TV zone; dining set; kitchen run). Some items differ from plan (added/extra table in living area; slight repositioning/scale differences in seating and storage).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable top-down/isometric presentation with consistent materials and good lighting. Camera is closer to orthographic top-down than a true isometric; slight perspective/softness reduces plan-to-render comparability. Geometry is mostly clean with minimal artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Several doors in the 2D plan are not faithfully placed/represented as doors in the 3D (render shows open wall gaps without clear door objects), reducing door placement fidelity (left entry, bedroom doors, bath/study doors).
Door swing/orientation information present in the 2D plan is not preserved in the 3D render (no swing arcs/leaf orientation; openings behave like pass-throughs).
Window placement/segmentation along the top exterior wall appears mismatched: the 3D shows a more continuous/merged glazing band than the discrete window openings implied in the 2D.
Left-side exterior glazing differs between plan and render (render shows a prominent left-wall window band that does not clearly correspond to the 2D window depiction).

Minor proportion distortion in the central circulation/living-room enclosure: the rendered corridor and interior partition lengths/offsets appear slightly different from the 2D plan, affecting perceived room sizes.
Hallucinated furniture element: a central coffee table/extra small table appears in the living area in the 3D render that is not shown in the 2D plan.
